title: 2011 election was free and fair in Nigeria

content.question: Which of the following statements about the 2011 Nigerian presidential election is most accurate?

choices.label: The leader of the People’s Progressive Party won the election.
For the first time in the Fourth Republic, a Muslim was elected.
The election was relatively free and fair, according to most observers.
The military intervened after the election to install its preferred candidate.
The eventual winner did very little campaigning during the election.

content.answer: The election was relatively free and fair, according to most observers.
